ctx: intros e1 e2 Hsubsume x o1 o2 Hosub.
exceptions.tactic: unfold subsume, osub, raw_insert, lookup in *.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce raw_insert to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros e1 e2 Hsubsume x o1 o2 Hosub.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
sub: A -> A -> Prop
sub_reflexive: forall a : A, sub a a
sub_transitive: forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3

Goal:
forall e1 e2 : env A, subsume e1 e2 -> forall (x : nat) (o1 o2 : option A), osub o1 o2 -> subsume (raw_insert x o1 e1) (raw_insert x o2 e2)

Premises:
osub = fun o1 o2 : option A => forall a2 : A, o2 = Some a2 -> exists a1 : A, o1 = Some a1 /\ sub a1 a2 : option A -> option A -> Prop
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
subsume = fun e1 e2 : env A => forall x : nat, osub (lookup x e1) (lookup x e2) : env A -> env A -> Prop
raw_insert : forall A : Type, nat -> option A -> env A -> env A
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
None : option ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
VarMap.Empty : VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
VarMap.Elt : ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
EnvRing.PEc : ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
EnvRing.PEX : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
EnvRing.PEsub : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
EnvRing.PEadd : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
osub_Some_inversion : forall (o1 : option A) (a2 : A), osub o1 (Some a2) -> exists a1 : A, o1 = Some a1 /\ sub a1 a2
Tauto.if_same : forall (b : bool) (t : ?A), (if b then t else t) = t where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
osub_transitive : forall o1 o2 o3 : option A, osub o1 o2 -> osub o2 o3 -> osub o1 o3
insert_eq_insert_2 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> forall b : A, insert x b e1 = insert x b e2
insert_eq_insert_1 : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x a1 e1 = insert x a2 e2 -> a1 = a2
subsume_transitive : forall e1 e2 e3 : env A, subsume e1 e2 -> subsume e2 e3 -> subsume e1 e3
osub_Some_Some : forall a1 a2 : A, sub a1 a2 -> osub (Some a1) (Some a2)
agree_insert : forall (A : Type) (e1 e2 : env A) (k : nat), agree e1 e2 k -> forall (x : nat) (o : option A), x <= k -> agree (raw_insert x o e1) (raw_insert x o e2) (1 + k)
insert_eq_insert_3 : forall (A : Type) (x1 x2 : nat) (a1 a2 : A) (e1 e2 : env A), insert x1 a1 e1 = insert x2 a2 e2 -> x1 <> x2 -> exists (e : env A) (y1 y2 : nat), e1 = insert y1 a2 e /\ e2 = insert y2 a1 e /\ shift x1 y1 = x2 /\ y2 = (if le_gt_dec x1 y1 then x1 else x1 - 1)
agree_below : forall (A : Type) (e1 e2 : env A) (x : nat) (a : A) (k : nat), lookup x e1 = Some a -> x < k -> agree e1 e2 k -> lookup x e2 = Some a
osub_None_Some : forall a2 : A, osub None (Some a2) -> False
length_insert_independent : forall (A : Type) (e : env A) (k x : nat) (a : A), length (insert x a e) <= k -> forall (y : nat) (o : option A), y < k -> length (raw_insert y o e) <= k
option_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : option A -> Type), (forall a : A, P (Some a)) -> P None -> forall o : option A, P o
lookup_map_some_reverse : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (b : B) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x (map f e) = Some b -> exists a : A, lookup x e = Some a /\ b = f a
fold_invariant : forall (A B : Type) (P : env A -> B -> Prop) (f : option A -> B -> B) (accu : B), P (empty A) accu -> (forall (o : option A) (e : env A) (accu0 : B), P e accu0 -> P (raw_insert 0 o e) (f o accu0)) -> forall e : env A, P e (fold f e accu)
length_insert : forall (A : Type) (x k km1 : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), length e <= km1 -> km1 <= k - 1 -> x < k -> length (raw_insert x o e) <= k
map_raw_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (e : env A), map f (raw_insert x None e) = raw_insert x None (map f e)
lookup_insert_bingo : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x = y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = o
map_insert_map : forall (A : Type) (f g h : A -> A) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), (forall a0 : A, f (g a0) = g (h a0)) -> map f (insert x a (map g e)) = insert x (f a) (map g (map h e))
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
Setoid.Seq_sym : forall (A : Type) (Aeq : Relation_Definitions.relation A), Setoid.Setoid_Theory A Aeq -> forall x y : A, Aeq x y -> Aeq y x

```coq
intros e1 e2 Hsubsume x o1 o2 Hosub.
unfold subsume, osub, raw_insert, lookup in *.
intros y.
destruct (Nat.eq_dec x y).
+ rewrite e. rewrite e in Hsubsume. rewrite Hosub.
  apply agree_insert; auto.
+ apply Hsubsume.
Qed.```

original: intros e1 e2 Hsubsume x o1 o2 Hosub. unfold subsume, osub, raw_insert, lookup in *. intros y. destruct (Nat.eq_dec x y). + rewrite e. rewrite e in Hsubsume. rewrite Hosub. apply agree_insert; auto. + apply Hsubsume.
